html:
4.27.18  11:49 pm   do you write sheet music for all of your songs

     nowadays i do it paperless

      or do you sometimes just hum it into a recording to remember the tune

     has lyrics with it

      and then record it later?

     i use a combinations of text files and audio recordings, referenced to each other with clear demos and descriptions of everything needed

4.27.18  10:58 pm   tell me a bad idea that i should try

     failing

4.27.18  10:41 pm   Why you make youtube videos?

     the videos are not specifically made for youtube, but i post them there because it is a popular site and i have a large audience there

4.27.18  10:38 pm   Where will I know it?

     anywhere

4.27.18  10:37 pm   how many countries are there? hmm

     that is complicated because not all countries are countries

4.27.18  10:29 pm   how do i tell my mum i don't like corned beef anymore

     you could ask her how you should tell someone else you don't like corned beef anymore

4.27.18  10:28 pm   You keep answering questions about people thinking you're depressed (at the expense of other, more interesting questions, I'm sure). What do you expect, when self-loathing and internal restlessness are recurring themes in your music?

     but what about all the themes of happiness, joy, and optimism, not to mention wonder and splendor

      To that, you'll say - Oh, but my lyrics aren't autobiographical!

     some of them are, but some of them are not

     Well then, 1)How do you explain why those topics are clearly on the forefront of your mind while writing,

     i just try to make the songs as good as i can

     and 2)Is there a single Reality video in which you *don't* seem frustrated and anxious?

     also very optimistic and driven

     The overall emotional tone of that whole page is negative.

     i think it is a tone of persistence, strong will, perseverence, focus, dedication, and determination, not to mention problem solving

     And there's nothing wrong with that! But it explains why everyone thinks you're depressed.

     i disagree

     Hopefully that settles this issue once and for all, and we can stop perseverating on it.

4.27.18  10:27 pm   why was there a fidget spinner in soap tips?

     there had to be something. i was looking at king leopold II of belgium but that was too scary

4.27.18  9:33 pm   What do you think about cars?

     you just never know where they're gonna go next

4.27.18  9:32 pm   Should I initiate a massive genocide on all penguins?

     no

4.27.18  9:31 pm   what's the best way to go?

      wayward

4.27.18  9:27 pm   If cold is the absence of heat, is silence the absence of sound?

     yes

4.27.18  9:20 pm   Do you enjoy staplers?

     sometimes

4.27.18  9:18 pm   how do you write lyrics for songs?

     i just have to come up with something. but it should be musical

4.27.18  9:17 pm   if 666 is evil then what is the root of evil?

     37 x 18

4.27.18  9:17 pm   i make songs about love but without actually expressing anything relating to me and my own thoughts. i hope this doesn't confuse people

     people have been doing it for thousands of years

4.27.18  8:28 pm   What do you think of serial killers?

     i don't like them

4.27.18  8:04 pm   Are you ever gonna sell merchandise?

     sure

4.27.18  8:01 pm   Wait I get it - the song is a song. its not lyrics + music = song

     the lyrics and music are both lyrics and music. in other words, the lyrics is actually lyrics and music, and the music is also lyrics and music. both are both. at least that's what it seems like to me

4.27.18  8:00 pm   How do you feel about people analyzing your videos for hidden, deeper meanings?

     fine

4.27.18  7:59 pm   I'm currently confused if I made a good or a bad decision. Any advice?

     almost every decision is an intricate mix of both

4.27.18  7:17 pm   How did you discover that 1+1+1+1 = 1?

     in a world where 1 was the only number available. i know that sounds strange but it is strange

4.27.18  7:15 pm   Will you ever write an autobiographical song ?

     i have done quite a few but i will do more

4.27.18  7:06 pm   What's your philosophy in life?

     see how many philosophies i can have

     the giant peach from james and the giant peach

4.27.18  5:51 pm   what dimension do you reside in?

     just the classics. up, left, and the other one

4.27.18  5:50 pm   Who stole my cat??

     could be one of the self-stealing ones

4.27.18  5:37 pm   do you pour the milk before or after putting cereal into a bowl

     i save the bowl for last

     F#, B, and more

4.27.18  5:17 pm   Do you wear a lab coat when creating your videos and music?

     lab pants

4.27.18  5:05 pm   What do I do if I'm a werewolf (how to become a non-werewolf)? 

     you could try UnAwere

4.27.18  5:02 pm   Your thoughts on the name 'jeep'?

     i think it's from GP

4.27.18  4:56 pm   From Gonna Clean My Room through Soap Tips, you do not show yourself playing instruments, etc. Then, after La De Da, you appear in every video.

     i think it is nice to appear in at least 20% of the content

     Why? Does this have something to do with creative styles? Did you just forget to do it? WHAT?

     probably just kim. i think he's the only one who has the internet

     because i spend the rest of the time making the content i post

     the pancake roof thing

     most of the misspellings are on this page, in the purple text which was not me

     yes

4.27.18  1:03 pm   What should I do if I have a melody, but can't figure out the chords to use?

     figure out the chords to every song you know. then you will take 1 glance at your song and it will be abundantly obvious

     1=2

     my question is where is it now

     My Rabbit
